# First Post Welcome!

Welcome to my blog, where I intend to post in-depth articles about how to accomplish specific setups end to end, where I found other tutorials incomplete or nonexistent. My interests are mainly in cloud-native technologies such as Kubernetes and AWS, but I may stray from time to time.

I welcome all readers to please let me know what they found useful and what they would like to learn more about. You can find me on Linkedin or email me using the links in the header.
